testCases.explanation: Partitions are 'ababcbaca' (len 9), 'defegde' (len 7), 'hijhklij' (len 8); each letter in exactly one part
All characters overlap; entire string is one partition
Single character; one partition of length 1
All characters are unique and appear once; each is its own partition
Both characters appear exactly once; two partitions of length 1 each

description: You are given a string s. We want to partition the string into as many parts as possible so that each letter appears in at most one part. Return a list of integers representing the size of these parts.

examples.explanation: The partition is "ababcbaca", "defegde", "hijhklij". This is a partition so that each letter appears in at most one part.

constraints: s consists of lowercase English letters
